resources.string: ikura - salmon roe cured with salt
Steamed Blue Prawn is a japanese delicasy.
Japanese YellowTail. They are eaten either cooked or raw, and are a seasonal favourite in the colder months when the meat must have higher fat content.

Hokkaido Scallop. Harvested from the cold deep waters of Hokkaido near Japan. These all natural sashimi grade scallops are great for a sushi application, pan sauteed, or broiled. A very hard to find item, sought after by some of the best chefs around.
Salmon Roe Cured With Salt. Ikura is the fully-ripe ovaries of salmon, and ranges from dark orange to reddish-orange in color.
Phone: 7737109538 \nAddress: 2131 Feldott Lane, Naperville, IL 60540 \nVisit Website: http://www.google.com
